snippet: SUSSMAN--Marvin. Mr. Marvin Sussman passed away on February 1 in his home. Born on March 17, 1927, he was a devoted son, brother, uncle, great-uncle and dear friend. Marvin was a WWII Navy Veteran as well as a Professor of Law at NYU. He was also affiliated with the Yeshiva University and Mt. Sinai Nurses Association. Additionally, he was an honored alumni of the Hastings College of Law. Funeral Services will be held at 10am, Wednesday, February 3 at Parkside Memorial Chapels, 98-60 Queens Boulevard, Rego Park, NY 11374, 718-896-9000, followed by interment at the Union Field cemetery. No flowers please. 1/3
